title: The Kardashians celebrate Caitlyn Jenner’s 70th birthday in style
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

The Kardashians and Jenners (well, the majority of them) were out in force on Tuesday night, as they got together to celebrate Caitlyn Jenner turning 70 years old.

Of course, an occasion as big as this needed a pretty spectacular venue, and Kylie Jenner chose one of their favourite restaurants, Nobu in Malibu, for the family to have a meal together.

Caitlyn was joined by daughters Kylie and Kendall Jenner, son Brandon Jenner, as well as ex-wife Kris Jenner, and Kourtney and Kim Kardashian.

Notably absent were Khloe Kardashian, who was apparently shooting an advert, and Brody Jenner, who is in Australia.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Caitlyn’s cake featured a super cute throwback photo of her with Kendall and Kylie when they were children, before her transition.

In a video on Kim’s Instagram story, Caitlyn revealed her birthday wish would be that they ‘all could get together more often’.

The family shared several photos and videos of the evening on social media, as they donned party hats and shared a meal in the stunning beachside surroundings.

Caitlyn was joined by her two youngest kids, Kendall and Kylie Jenner (Picture: Instagram)

Her cake featured a throwback photo of her as Bruce, with Kendall and Kylie as kids (Picture: Kourtney Kardashian / Instagram)

Despite Kourtney and Kim Kardashian turning up for the do, it’s not a shock that Khloe didn’t, as she and Caitlyn have had a difficult relationship since Caitlyn’s memoir was released, which featured unflattering stories about Kris.

In April 2017, Caitlyn revealed in an interview with Andy Cohen that she and Khloe weren’t on speaking terms, explaining: ‘She doesn’t want to talk to me. She hasn’t talked to me in, like, two years.’

The majority of the Kardashian-Jenner clan turned up to wish Caitlyn a happy birthday (Picture: Instagram)

Brody was also left hurt after Caitlyn didn’t attend his wedding to Kaitlynn Carter last year in Indonesia, though the rift between them has lasted longer than the marriage itself.

Advertisement

Advertisement

He said on The Hills: New Beginnings: ‘Honestly, it really did hurt and I would have loved to have had her there, but she had better things to do, apparently.’

Brody and Kaitlynn ended up splitting up over the summer, before she had a short-lived, six week fling with Miley Cyrus.

description: The Kardashians joined forces to celebrate Caitlyn Jenner turning 70 with a lavish birthday party at Nobu, Malibu.
